title: Modify search suggestion settings
description: Modifies the user's search suggestion settings.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: RecentSearchesEnabled
fields.description: Whether or not to enable recording of recent searches against the user's profile. Setting this to false clears the user's recent searches and prevents search queries from being recorded.

returns.description: <SearchSuggestionsResponse> Details on whether the operation succeeded.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
